sourceDesc.bibl: HAYLEY William, An essay on painting in two Epistles to MR Romney, Londra 1781, in 4. — Epistle to a friend on the death of John Thorn ton by the autor of an epistle to an eminent painter, Lond. 1783. — Ode inscribed to John Howard author of The state of english and forcing prisons, Lond. 1781. — An essai on history in three epistles to Edevard Gibbon with notes, Lond. 1781. — The triumphs of temper a poem in six cantos, 1781. — Essais on epic poetry, 1781. Tutte queste opere poetiche e pittoriche sono legate in un volume, ma non sono fra le più celebrate.
